summary: An innocent woman is sent to a Czech prison, where the sadistic warden and guards rape and perform bizarre sex acts on the prisoners.
cast: Brigitte Nielsen|Paul Koslo|Kimberley Kates|Kari Whitman|Jana Svandová|Marek Vasut|Lucie Benesová|Markéta Hrubesová|John C. Smith|Jiri Popel|Vanda Svarcová|Petra Susser|Pan Fiala|David Buonantony
title: Cadenas ardientes 2
